Material used.Description: Transfection studies in human cell lines to assess variant effects.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant exhibited higher toxicity and aggregation under oxidative stress compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Logistic regression for case-control analysis; descriptive statistics for functional studies.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No specific threshold mentioned; normal function inferred from wild-type baseline.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant increase in toxicity/aggregation under oxidative stress compared to wild-type.
